translated: The Numerical Discourses🔽The Numerical Lists in the Chapter on the Discourses🔽The Pairs on the Factors of Awakening
The Pairs on Lightning🔽The states that are like lightning.
The states that are like a thunderbolt.
The Pairs on Fools🔽The states of a fool.
The states of a wise person.
The Pairs on Dark🔽The dark states.
The Pairs on Burning🔽The states that burn.
The states that do not burn.
The Pairs on Terms🔽The states that are terms.
The states that are the path of terms.
The Pairs on Language🔽The states that are language.
The states that are the path of language.
The Pairs on Description🔽The states that are descriptions.
The states that are the path of descriptions.
The Pairs on Name🔽Name and form.
